scripts.dev:db:migrate: npm run build:sequelize && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env development --config ./sequelize/config.json --migrations-path ./sequelize/build/migrations
scripts.dev:db:migrate:undo: npm run build:sequelize && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --env development --config ./sequelize/config.json --migrations-path ./sequelize/build/migrations
scripts.prod:db:migrate: npm run build:sequelize && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env production --config ./sequelize/config.json --migrations-path ./sequelize/build/migrations
scripts.prod:db:migrate:undo: npm run build:sequelize && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env production --config ./sequelize/config.json --migrations-path ./sequelize/build/migrations
